comment._content: This is the inside of the Federal Reserve Bank of Richmond vault located on 9th and Franklin Street.

comment.author: 97393183@N00
comment._content: This building was renovated in 1980 and has been the home of the Supreme Court of Virginia since that time.

comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Holding up Money, and we'd love to have this added to the group!
